devices.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'device' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.enabled == false) return; emit(doc.device_type || 'sip_device', 1); }

object_plans.map: function(doc) { if(!doc.service || !doc.service.plans || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_type, doc.service.plans); }

opaque_billing.map: function(doc) { if(!doc.billing || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (index in doc.billing) emit( index, doc.billing[index] ); }

users.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.enabled == false) return; emit(doc.priv_level || 'user', 1); }
